sourcesContent:
export const HEADER_API_KEY = "x-metro-api-key";
export const HEADER_SESSION_TOKEN = "x-metro-sessiontoken";

const withAsyncController = (handler) => (req, res, next) => handler(req, res, next).catch(next);

export default  withAsyncController ;

sourcesContent:
export const HEADER_API_KEY = "x-metro-api-key";
export const HEADER_SESSION_TOKEN = "x-metro-sessiontoken";

const withAsyncController = (handler) => (req, res, next) => handler(req, res, next).catch(next);

export default  withAsyncController ;
